lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt confirmed suffering a grade one hamstring tear at Jamaica's Olympic trials on Friday but the star sprinter expects to secure his place at the Rio Games by proving his fitness at the London Anniversary Games later this month.

headline.print_headline: Hamstrung Bolt Hopes to Prove Fitness in London to Secure Rio Spot
headline.main: Hamstrung Bolt Hopes to Prove Fitness in London to Secure Rio Spot

snippet: Usain Bolt confirmed suffering a grade one hamstring tear at Jamaica's Olympic trials on Friday but the star sprinter expects to secure his place at the Rio Games by proving his fitness at the London Anniversary Games later this month....
